title: Get game ready for the Masters with TruGolf, on sale for just $199.99
content:
Golf’s biggest event, the Masters Tournament, is just around the corner. Do you dream of being able to play alongside the pros? Though there are a few different ways to get yourself on world-class courses like the Augusta National Golf Club, probably the most realistic option for most is with the TruGolf Simulator — which is currently on sale, but only until 11:59 pm Pacific on March 15.

The TruGolf Mini Golf Simulator provides one of the most realistic virtual playing experiences you’re likely to find at this price point. You can use the included swing trainer and sensor to analyze your game in detail, so you can fine-tune every aspect of it. And, perhaps best of all, it provides you with access to hyper-realistic digital versions of world-class golf courses so you can play the same holes as the biggest names in the game.

If you’ve fantasized about playing at a professional-level golf course and improving your game at the same time, then the TruGolf Mini Golf Simulator may be the best way to go about it. And since it costs way less than the MSRP during this limited-time sale — just $199.99, no coupon codes required — there’s no time like the present to go get it.
